summary: A spatial transformation that extracts a region of interest from an image, allowing either a fixed size or a randomly sampled size within specified bounds, and positioning the crop at either a random location or the image center. It gracefully handles cases where the requested ROI exceeds the image dimensions and can operate in a lazy mode to defer actual data manipulation.
